parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ input: { subject: { tenant_id: $('Check Validation').first().json.tenant_id || 'unknown', scope: $('Check Validation').first().json.scope || 'unknown', role: 'workflow' }, resource: { tenant_id: $('Check Validation').first().json.tenant_id || 'unknown', scope: $('Check Validation').first().json.scope || 'unknown', task_type: (($('Check Validation').first().json.task || {}).type) || 'code_execution', template: 'n8n-dispatch' }, action: 'executor.execute', context: { request_id: $('Check Validation').first().json.request_id, network_enabled: false, payload_size: JSON.stringify($('Check Validation').first().json.task || {}).length } } }) }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ ({ status: 'error', message: $input.first().json.message, request_id: $input.first().json.request_id || null, policy: $input.first().json.policy || null, approval: $input.first().json.approval || null }) }}

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO memory_episodes (tenant_id, scope, summary, outcome, started_at, ended_at, metadata_jsonb)
VALUES ('{{ $input.first().json.tenant_id }}', '{{ $input.first().json.scope }}', 'executor task executed', '{{ $input.first().json.outcome }}', NOW(), NOW(), '{{ JSON.stringify($input.first().json.output).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb);

INSERT INTO audit_events (actor, action, target, decision, payload_jsonb, created_at)
VALUES ('workflow:executor_dispatch', 'executor_run', '{{ $input.first().json.scope }}', '{{ $input.first().json.policy.decision || "allowed" }}', '{{ JSON.stringify({ request_id: $input.first().json.request_id || "", policy: $input.first().json.policy || {} }).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb, NOW());
